headline: Ask HN: Is Ruby on Rails still relevant?
description:
I'm currently going through Destroy All Software's screencasts [0]. They're heavily based on Ruby + Rails and TDD, although most of the concepts probably do do translate to other languages.

Since the screencasts are over 10 years old now, I'm wondering if Ruby on Rails is still going strong. What resources would you recommend to get into Ruby/Rails specifically? Same question for TDD? Thanks!

[0] https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/screencasts/catalog
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Rails上的Ruby仍然相关吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Rails上的Ruby仍然相關嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
我目前正在翻阅Destroy All Software的截屏[0]。他们在很大程度上是基于Ruby + Rails和TDD的，尽管大多数概念可能确实可以转化为其他语言。

由于这些截屏已经超过10年了，我想知道Ruby on Rails是否还在发展。你会推荐哪些资源来学习Ruby/Rails？对TDD也有同样的问题？谢谢！

[0] https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/screencasts/catalog
description_zh-Hant:
我目前正在翻閱Destroy All Software的截屏[0]。他們在很大程度上是基於Ruby + Rails和TDD的，儘管大多數概念可能確實可以轉化為其他語言。

由於這些截屏已經超過10年了，我想知道Ruby on Rails是否還在發展。你會推薦哪些資源來學習Ruby/Rails？對TDD也有同樣的問題？謝謝！

[0] https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/screencasts/catalog
